entries.title: Frontend Developer Intern
bulletPoints: Built the MOOC Validator Portal, a certificate verification tool used by 7,500+ students.
Developed modular frontend using TypeScript and DaisyUI; integrated FastAPI/Django with TanStack Query.
Wrote 4,000+ lines of code across 20+ commits; involved in daily stand-ups and sprint planning.
Optimized platform that handled 10,000+ submissions and 30,000+ views.

entries.title: B.Tech in Computer Science and Engineering
entries.company: @Netaji Subhas University of Technology (NSUT), Delhi, India
